line_1: Or Lioness of royal whelps foredone,
line_2: In Peace, as mild as the departing Sun,

line_1: "'Till thou shalt grant a better change foredone;
line_2: (Replied th' indulgent mother to her son;)

line_1: "'Till thou shalt grant a better change foredone;
line_2: "Nor shall that change, but thro' death gates be won.

line_1: "'Till thou shalt grant a better change foredone;
